newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: PRESS DIGEST - New Zealand newspapers - Aug 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New Zealand newspapers - Aug 21.

text.p: Front Page - Forest sale raises job fears at mill
- Public handout for party election broadcasts
Business - Fletchers may sell other forests to fund buy
- CHH puts brave face on 64pc profit drop
Sport - Factions in Bok camp fingered for Small demise
- Netballers arrange private game to keep focused
- Bryce Taylor helps out young contenders
Front page - $2 billion for Forest Corp, FCL and partners
Business - Carter profit slump knocks share price
Sport - Mehrtens may be back for Pretoria
- Test players lighten South Africans' gloom
- Three changes in Wellington side on King
Front page - Probe into murder trial coverage
- Swedish kin rush to dying girl's bedside
Business - Forest deal detail expected today
Sport - Small punished for lack of discipline
- Hart spoiled for choice, says Lochore
